flavor: Sometimes in an instant you realize who your friends really are.
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. Look at the top 6 cards of your stack. You may trash any of those cards and arrange the rest in any order.
text:
Play only as your first [click].
Look at the top 6 cards of your stack. You may trash any of those cards and arrange the rest in any order.
title: Making an Entrance

flavor: "Underestimate those people at your own peril." -Akshara Sareen
stripped_text: Access -> Pay the trash cost of the card you are accessing: Remove it from the game. Use this ability only once per turn.
text: Access -> Pay the trash cost of the card you are accessing: Remove it from the game. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Salsette Slums

flavor: The more parties she attended, the more they trusted her. The more they trusted her, the more entertaining her scams became.
stripped_text: Draw 1 card. Gain 1 credit for each copy of Exclusive Party in your heap. Limit 6 per deck.
text:
Draw 1 card. Gain 1[credit] for each copy of Exclusive Party in your heap.
Limit 6 per deck.
title: Exclusive Party

stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with exactly 1 subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. 2 credits: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
text: Interface -> 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with exactly 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. 2[credit]: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
title: Vamadeva

stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 subroutines. 2 credits: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, add 1 installed non-virus program to the top of your stack.
text: Interface -> 1[credit]: Break up to 2 subroutines. 2[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, add 1 installed non-virus program to the top of your stack.
title: Brahman

stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. The first time this turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, draw 2 cards.
text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. The first time this turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, draw 2 cards.
title: Patron

flavor: In these days of digital full-sim browsing and widely available nano-assembly, it takes a special kind of crazy person to go shopping in meatspace. There are millions of them.
stripped_text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware from your grip, you may install another copy of that hardware from your grip (paying all costs).
text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware from your grip, you may install another copy of that hardware from your grip (paying all costs).
title: Bazaar

stripped_text: Whenever the Runner searches his or her stack or installs a card from his or her heap, he or she must trash a card from his or her grip at random.
text: Whenever the Runner searches his or her stack or installs a card from his or her heap, he or she must trash a card from his or her grip at random.
title: Personality Profiles

stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance haas-bioroid cards in your deck. The first time you spend 3click on the same action each turn, gain click.
text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [haas-bioroid] cards in your deck. The first time you spend 3[click] on the same action each turn, gain [click].
title: Jeeves Model Bioroids

stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance {jinteki} cards in your deck. Whenever you draw a card, you may lose click. If you do, reveal that card and 1 card in Archives of the same type. Swap those cards. Use this ability only once per turn.
text:
This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance {jinteki} cards in your deck.
Whenever you draw a card, you may lose [click]. If you do, reveal that card and 1 card in Archives of the same type. Swap those cards. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Raman Rai

flavor: "Connect two truths. Connect two programs. All is one."
stripped_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Resolve a subroutine on a piece of rezzed psi ice.
text: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner loses 2[credit]. [subroutine] Resolve a subroutine on a piece of rezzed psi ice.
title: Upayoga

flavor: "As the world shrinks, communications becomes the most essential technology." -Ramesh Gupta, One World Economy
stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful trace, gain 1 credit and the Runner loses 1 credit.
text: Whenever there is a successful trace, gain 1[credit] and the Runner loses 1[credit].
title: Aryabhata Tech

stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance  cards in your deck. Name a card. The Runner reveals his or her grip and trashes all copies of the named card from his or her grip.
text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [nbn] cards in your deck. Name a card. The Runner reveals his or her grip and trashes all copies of the named card from his or her grip.
title: Salem's Hospitality

stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance  cards in your deck. click: Search R&D for an executive, sysop, or character, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [weyland-consortium] cards in your deck. [click]: Search R&D for an executive, sysop, or character, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
title: Executive Search Firm

flavor: "Wealth wisely invested is wealth earned." -The New Gospel of Wealth
stripped_text: Whenever you rez or play an out-of-faction card (including Indian Union Stock Exchange), gain 1 credit.
text: Whenever you rez or play an out-of-faction card (including Indian Union Stock Exchange), gain 1[credit].
title: Indian Union Stock Exchange

flavor: The naja naja is the king of all serpents.
stripped_text: Subroutine Trash 1 program. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.
title: Cobra

flavor: It's the exact same coffee, but the price sure is different.
stripped_text: Search R&D for any number of copies of a card, reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
text: Search R&D for any number of copies of a card, reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
title: Localized Product Line

stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 7 or more assets in your deck. If the Runner accesses Mumbad Virtual Tour while it is installed, he or she must trash it, if able.
text:
This card costs 0 influence if you have 7 or more assets in your deck.
If the Runner accesses Mumbad Virtual Tour while it is installed, he or she must trash it, if able.
title: Mumbad Virtual Tour
